articles.author: David Slotnick
articles.title: American Airlines chief commercial officer makes surprising exit - The Points Guy
articles.description: Vasu Raja, American Airlines' chief commercial officer, will depart the airline in June, the company said in a statement. The airline had previously denied rumors that Raja's exit was imminent.
articles.content:
Vasu Raja, American Airlines' chief commercial officer, will depart the company in June, the airline said Tuesday.
Word of Raja's exit comes a week after the airline denied that he was planning to l… [+2179 chars]

articles.author: Oren Liebermann, Natasha Bertrand
articles.title: US pier constructed off Gaza has broken apart - CNN
articles.description: The temporary pier constructed by the US military to transport aid into Gaza broke apart and sustained damage in heavy seas on Tuesday in a major blow to the American-led effort to create a maritime corridor for humanitarian supplies into the war-torn enclave…

articles.author: Katherine Donlevy
articles.title: American Airlines plane pushed from gate by 80 mph gusts at Dallas Fort Worth Airport: wild video - New York Post
articles.description: The nose of the American Airlines 737-800 — with a weight of 90,000 pounds — was shoved along the tarmac after disconnecting the loading bridge, shocking video shows.
articles.content:
Powerful winds pushed a massive American Airlines plane from its gate at Dallas Fort Worth Airport Tuesday — as severe thunderstorms battered the state.
